name: MERUVA REDDI NAGA NARASIMHA
title: Data Analyst
about: A dedicated analytics, business, and marketing professional with over 2.5 years of experience, known for delivering results. Proficient in identifying patterns and extracting meaningful insights from past data, leading to tangible and effective business strategies.

experience.title: Associate Ops & Analytics
responsibilities: Created a ROMI Power BI dashboard by integrating sales, revenue, and campaign spend data from ADF using optimized SQL queries.
Designed an interactive MoM analysis dashboard with improved UI/UX for US stakeholders.
Achieved a 70% improvement in reporting efficiency for faster decision-making.
Developed a Competitors Contents Dashboard using Python, Pandas, and Selenium to scrape competitor content.

experience.title: Data Analyst
responsibilities: Designed a centralized Power BI dashboard to track clicks, orders, and revenue.
Utilized NLTK and TextBlob for sentiment analysis of 100,000 reviews.
Automated reports, saving 10+ hours per week and boosting team efficiency by 20%.
Conducted Share of Voice (SOV) analysis and competitor keyword analysis.

projects.title: ROMI Power BI Dashboard
projects.description: Created a ROMI dashboard by integrating sales, revenue, and campaign spend from ADF using optimized SQL.

projects.title: Competitors Contents Dashboard
projects.description: Scraped and analyzed competitor article data using Python, Pandas, and Selenium to build an interactive Power BI dashboard.

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed 100K+ reviews using NLTK and TextBlob to identify sentiment distribution.

projects.title: SOV (Share of Voice) Analysis
projects.description: Conducted keyword analysis across 100+ search terms to refine marketing strategy.

achievements: Best Performer in Marketing Analyst Team – Hiveminds, Aug '22
Participated in the Hold the Load event – Builder’s Hive, NIT Trichy
Qualified for the QUIZZES event – Sairam College
